definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be long, almost alw. of time (As. arâku COT:Gloss, Aram. [[אֲרַח]], )—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[אָֽרְכוּ]] Ge 26:8; Impf. [[יַאַרְכוּ]] Ez Eze 12:22; 3 fpl. [[וַתֶּאֱרַכְנׇה]] Ez Eze 31:5 (del. B Co)—be long, subj. [[הַיׇמִים]] (i.e. a long time passed Ge 26:8 (J); cf. As. urriku ûmî, days grew long, Creation Tablet:a v. COT Ge 1:1); of delayed fulfillment of prophecy Ez Eze 12:22; subj. [[פּאׁוֹת]] Ez Eze 31:5 (but cf. supr.)

trans. prolong, (a) obj. [[יׇמִים]] (i.e. live long) De 4:26, De 4:40, De 5:30, De 11:9, De 17:20, De 22:7, De 30:18, De 32:47, Jos 24:31= Ju Jdg 2:7 (c. [[אַחֲרֵי]] = survive), Pr 28:16, Is 53:10, Ec 8:13 ; also (late) without [[ימים]] Ec 7:15, Ec 8:12; (b) id. 1Ki 3:14 ´[[י]] subj. [[וְהַאֲרַכְתִּי אֶת־יׇמֶיךָ]] I will prolong thy days; (c) postpone  anger Is 48:9 cf. Pr 19:11 (i.e. shew oneself slow to anger); v. also Job 6:11 [[אַאֲרִיח נַפְשִׁי]] i.e. be patient; (d) lit. (but in fig.) make long furrows (c. [[ל]]) Ps 129:3; tentcords Is 54:2; tongue Is 57:4 (stretch out in mockery).

intrans. grow long, continue long (i.e. display length or continuance), subj. [[יׇמִים]] Ex 20:12 = De 5:16, De 6:2, De 25:15; tarry long Nu 9:19, Nu 9:22 (subj. [[הֶעָנׇן]]), last (continue) long, (subj. [[כֵּן]] Pr 28:2; be long (lit.) of staves of ark 1Ki 8:8, 2Ch 5:9.
